File ringbuf.h

RCS Header: ringbuf.h 1.0 Sun 07-23-2000 10:36:48 pm

This is the header file for ringbuf.c which contains functions for a circular buffer, for character storage and retrieval.

Preprocessor definitions

Avoid multiple inclusion

#define _RINGBUF_H_

Define a BYTE if this is not already done

#define BYTE

Set an absolute maximum buffer size

#define MAX_RINGBUF_SIZE 4096

Typedef RINGBUF

This is the structure definition of RINGBUF

typedef struct _RINGBUF_ RINGBUF
struct _RINGBUF_ 
   { 
     unsigned char* buf; Pointer to the created buffer
     int spos; Store position
     int rpos; Retrieval position
     int size; Defined ringbuffer size
     size_t cnt; Number of bytes actually stored
   }
